entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:46 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 6:24 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure: 99.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: E 54 km/h gust 67 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 20 this evening then southwest 30 gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the morning with risk of freezing rain. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
